column4: is there a command to delete folders with items in it?  when i use rmdir it always says i can't because there's something in it.
man rm says use the -R switch
it's that way for a reason; double check the contents to make sure :=)
no; i used photorec to pull up my garbage that i had erased.  now i want to get rid of it cause i have tons of folders on my desktop that require root to remove.
go for it; Tebow it, ha
